meanings.definition: A type of flower that blooms during the day.
meanings.sent1: The sundrops in the garden looked beautiful in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I picked some sundrops to put in a vase on the table.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the sundrops, enjoying their nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a field of sundrops, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sundrops swayed gently in the breeze, adding color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: The act of dropping something during sunset.
meanings.sent1: The sundrops of the curtain signaled the end of the play.
meanings.sent2: He watched the sundrops of the sun as it disappeared below the horizon.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally caused sundrops of water to spill from the glass.
meanings.sent4: The sundrops of leaves falling from the tree created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sundrops of paint on the canvas added a touch of warmth to the artwork.
